    Task, TaskGraph
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRunnableTask, AbstractServiceTask, NonRunnableTask, PoisonTask, RunnableTask, TaskGraphImp, TaskImp, ToolImp

      • getToolPackage

        java.lang.String getToolPackage()
        Returns:
        a Java style package name for this tool in the form [package].[package]. i.e. Common.Input

      • getQualifiedToolName

        java.lang.String getQualifiedToolName()
        Returns:
        the full-qualified (Java style) name of the tool, i.e. toolpackage.toolname

      • getDefinitionPath

        java.net.URL getDefinitionPath()
        Returns:
        the location directory that held the definition file this tool was generated from. This could be XML or a Java .class file. Other things might be supported in the future.

      • getToolBox

        Toolbox getToolBox()
        Returns:
        the path to the toolbox that this tool has been loaded from.

      • getDataInputTypes

        java.lang.String[] getDataInputTypes()
        Returns:
        an array of general input types for nodes not covered by getDataInputTypes(int node)

      • getDataInputTypes

        java.lang.String[] getDataInputTypes(int node)
        Returns:
        the data types accepted on the specified node index (if null is returned then the general input types should be assumed)

      • getDataOutputTypes

        java.lang.String[] getDataOutputTypes()
        Returns:
        an array of general output types for nodes for nodes not covered by getDataOutputTypes(int node)

      • getDataOutputTypes

        java.lang.String[] getDataOutputTypes(int node)
        Returns:
        an data types output by the specified node index (if null is returned then the general output types should be assumed)

      • getDataInputNodeCount

        int getDataInputNodeCount()
        Returns:
        the number of input nodes (default value in ToolImp)

        Returns:
        the number of output nodes (default value in ToolImp)
